verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> of <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment:<s%> unto thee, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> will I <S%H2167>sing.<s%>

I will behave myself <S%H7919>wisely<s%> in a <S%H8549>perfect<s%> <S%H1870>way.<s%> O <S%H4970>when<s%> wilt thou <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me? I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%> with a <S%H8537>perfect<s%> <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

I will <S%H7896>set<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1100>wicked<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> I <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H6213>work<s%> of them that turn <S%H7750>aside;<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1692>cleave<s%> to me.
A <S%H6141>froward<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me: I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> a <S%H7451>wicked<s%> person.

Whoso <S%H5643>privily<s%> <S%H3960>slandereth<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> him will I cut <S%H6789>off:<s%> him that hath a <S%H1362>high<s%> <S%H5869>look<s%> and a <S%H7342>proud<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> I <S%H3201>suffer.<s%>

Mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall be upon the <S%H539>faithful<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> that they may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5978>with<s%> me: he that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in a <S%H8549>perfect<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H8334>serve<s%> me.

He that <S%H6213>worketh<s%> <S%H7423>deceit<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> my <S%H1004>house:<s%> he that <S%H1696>telleth<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3559>tarry<s%> <S%H5048>in<s%> my <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

I will <S%H1242>early<s%> <S%H6789>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> that I may cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H6466>doers<s%> from the <S%H4480>city<s%> <S%H5892><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
